argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idlss.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | idlss.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_idlss | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> I C_ X ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ A e. I ) -> A e. X ) |
